subject: Has anyone had any luck running JUnit plugin tests under eclipse 3.3M6?
msgSnippet: We re currently targeting Eclipse 3.2 as our target platform - but I wanted all of the shiny goodness that is Eclipse 3.3. However I find when I try to run my
messageBody:
We're currently targeting Eclipse 3.2 as our target platform - but I wanted
all of the shiny goodness that is Eclipse 3.3. However I find when I try to
run my JUnit tests as plugins - I get following error (which seems to say
that its look for the 3.3 instance of the JUnit runtime)[1]. Without
changing my target platform (out of my control) is there anyway to run the
tests (and therefore use 3.3)?

Thanks in advance
Mark Levison
-------------------------------------------
